Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Narragansett/Between George-Diversey
ShortDescription: SB #86 buses are rerouted via Narragansett, Belmont, Austin, Diversey & Narragansett: due to, street blockage near Narragansett/Between George-Diversey.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Belmont, Austin, Diversey and Narragansett: due to, street blockage near Narragansett/Between George-Diversey.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Southbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Irving Park
ShortDescription: Southbound 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Montrose and Cicero: due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Irving Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Montrose and Cicero: due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Irving Park.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier signal problem near Southport. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier signal problem near Southport.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown and Purple Line Express Service Delayed near Chicago
ShortDescription: Brown and Purple Line Express trains are standing near Chicago due to track conditions. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown and Purple Line Express trains are standing near Chicago due to track conditions.

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service. See station personnel for details.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
